description:
Mahri is the younger sister of Rudy and lives with him at the Trovita Island Gym.
Mahri and her Seel were both rescued from a whirlpool by Misty and her Staryu. After reaching shore Mahri hoped that Misty would stay on the island with her and Rudy and was dissapointed when Misty cheered Ash rather than Rudy in the Pok√©mon Gym battle.
name: Marie
